chunks.title: Regulation 1 - Short title These regulations may be cited as the Land Tax Regulations 2021 .
chunks.main_structural_heading: Short title These regulations may be cited as the Land Tax Regulations 2021 .

chunks.title: Regulation 2 - Commencement These regulations take effect on 15 December 2021.
chunks.main_structural_heading: Commencement These regulations take effect on 15 December 2021.

chunks.title: Regulation 3 - Interpretation In these regulations - Act means the Land Tax Act 2000 .
chunks.main_structural_heading: Interpretation In these regulations - Act means the Land Tax Act 2000 .

chunks.title: Regulation 4 - Prescribed owner of land For the purposes of paragraph (b) of the definition of owner in section 3A(1) of the Act, the following persons are prescribed:
chunks.main_structural_heading: Prescribed owner of land For the purposes of paragraph (b) of the definition of owner in section 3A(1) of the Act, the following persons are prescribed:
chunks.text:
(a) in the case of land not registered under the Land Titles Act
     1980 and subject to a mortgage or other encumbrance under which a
     person is entitled to an equity of redemption, the person for the
     time being having that equity of redemption;
     (b) in the case of land not registered under the Land Titles Act
     1980 and not subject to a mortgage or other encumbrance -
     (i) if a person is entitled to an estate of freehold in the land for
     his or her life, that person; or
     (ii) if subparagraph (i) does not apply, the person entitled to an
     estate in fee simple in the land.

chunks.title: Regulation 5 - Repatriation health card For the purposes of section 19(a)(ii) of the Act, a Repatriation Health Card - For All Conditions, with a war widow or war widower endorsement, issued under the Veterans' Entitlements Act 1986 of the Commonwealth is prescribed to be equivalent to a Pensioner Concession Card.
chunks.main_structural_heading: Repatriation health card For the purposes of section 19(a)(ii) of the Act, a Repatriation Health Card - For All Conditions, with a war widow or war widower endorsement, issued under the Veterans' Entitlements Act 1986 of the Commonwealth is prescribed to be equivalent to a Pensioner Concession Card.

chunks.title: Regulation 6 - Amendment of assessment An amendment of an assessment of land tax made under the Land and Income Taxation Act 1910 for any financial year ending on or before
chunks.main_structural_heading: Amendment of assessment An amendment of an assessment of land tax made under the Land and Income Taxation Act 1910 for any financial year ending on or before

chunks.title: Regulation 30 - June 2000 is to be made under that Act as if it had not been repealed.
chunks.main_structural_heading: June 2000 is to be made under that Act as if it had not been repealed.

chunks.title: Regulation 7 - Prescribed fees The following fees are prescribed as the fees payable for the matters to which they respectively relate:
chunks.main_structural_heading: Prescribed fees The following fees are prescribed as the fees payable for the matters to which they respectively relate:
chunks.text:
(a) if an application for a search under section 42(1) of the Act, a
     fee of 6 fee units;
     (b) if an issue of a certificate under section 42(2) of the Act, a
     fee of 1.5 fee units.
   Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act
   1953.
   Notified in the Gazette on 1 December 2021
   These regulations are administered in the Department of Treasury and
   Finance.
